description: Portable resource registry template. Maps every processor, module, interceptor, component, data store, and execution pattern from the four schema files to a stable, greppable UUID. Copy this file to specs/schemas/resource_registry.json and customize for your project.

db-b7r2.name: processor
db-b7r2.description: Backend processor module — core data processing unit with operations

db-d3w8.name: data_access_object
db-d3w8.description: Data access object — encapsulates database queries and persistence

db-f8n5.name: data_structure
db-f8n5.description: Backend data structure — table/entity schema with fields, relations, and validations

db-h2s4.name: service
db-h2s4.description: Backend service — orchestrates data access objects and business logic

db-j6x9.name: backend_verifier
db-j6x9.description: Backend verifier — validation conditions applied to structures and operations

db-l1c3.name: backend_error_definitions
db-l1c3.description: Backend error type definitions — error codes, messages, categories

api-m5g7.name: endpoint
api-m5g7.description: Backend API endpoint — HTTP route with method, handler, filters, parameters, and responses

api-n8k2.name: request_handler
api-n8k2.description: Request handler — bridges endpoints to processor operations

api-p3e6.name: filter
api-p3e6.description: Backend filter — request/response pipeline interceptor with conditions

api-q7v1.name: frontend_api_contract
api-q7v1.description: Frontend API contract — typed reference to a backend endpoint

mq-r4z8.name: backend_process_chain
mq-r4z8.description: Backend process chain — ordered sequence of processor operations with conditions

mq-s9b4.name: interceptor
mq-s9b4.description: Middleware interceptor — hooks into execution stages with priority and conditions

mq-t2f7.name: execution_pattern
mq-t2f7.description: Middleware execution pattern — trigger conditions, rules, and bypass logic

mq-u6j3.name: middleware_process_chain
mq-u6j3.description: Middleware process chain — ordered interceptor chain with pre/post processing stages

ui-v3n6.name: module
ui-v3n6.description: Frontend module — UI module with components, navigation, state, and events

ui-w8p2.name: component
ui-w8p2.description: Frontend component — UI element with properties, state, functions, event handlers, and templates

ui-x1r9.name: access_control
ui-x1r9.description: Frontend access control — route guard with condition and redirect

ui-y5t3.name: data_loader
ui-y5t3.description: Frontend data loader — async data fetcher bridging backend endpoints to UI

ui-z2w7.name: utility_module
ui-z2w7.description: Frontend utility module — reusable UI helper functions

ui-a4y1.name: frontend_verifier
ui-a4y1.description: Frontend verifier — client-side validation rules applied to components

cfg-b8m6.name: shared_utility
cfg-b8m6.description: Shared utility module — cross-layer helper with functions and error handling

cfg-d2q3.name: common_structure
cfg-d2q3.description: Shared common structure — cross-layer data structure with fields, functions, and validation

cfg-f7s8.name: data_type
cfg-f7s8.description: Shared data type — base type with constraints and serialization rules

cfg-h5v9.name: transformer
cfg-h5v9.description: Shared transformer — input-to-output type conversion with transformation rules

cfg-j9w2.name: shared_error_definitions
cfg-j9w2.description: Shared error type definitions — cross-layer error codes, categories, severity

cfg-k3x7.name: constant
cfg-k3x7.description: Shared constant — named value with type and category

cfg-l8y1.name: shared_settings
cfg-l8y1.description: Shared settings — global config with env keys and refresh policy

cfg-m2z6.name: backend_settings
cfg-m2z6.description: Backend settings — global-scoped config with env variable mapping

cfg-n7a3.name: frontend_settings
cfg-n7a3.description: Frontend settings — local-scoped config with env variable mapping

cfg-p4b8.name: shared_logging
cfg-p4b8.description: Shared logging — cross-layer log format, levels, outputs, aggregation, and filters

cfg-q9c5.name: backend_logging
cfg-q9c5.description: Backend logging — processing layer log format, levels, and outputs

cfg-r3d7.name: frontend_logging
cfg-r3d7.description: Frontend logging — interface layer log format, levels, and outputs

cfg-s6e2.name: testing
cfg-s6e2.description: Shared testing — fixtures, assertions, test suites

mq-c1g5.name: interceptor_interface
mq-c1g5.description: Shared interceptor interface — contract defining interceptor method signatures

cfg-t5h9.name: security
cfg-t5h9.description: Shared security — authentication strategies, authorization roles, encryption, sanitization. Activate if your project requires auth/authz.

cfg-u2k4.name: caching
cfg-u2k4.description: Shared caching — strategies with policies, durations, invalidation rules. Activate if your project uses caching.

cfg-v8l7.name: internationalization
cfg-v8l7.description: Shared i18n — locales, translations, date/number/currency formats. Activate if your project supports multiple locales.

cfg-w4n3.name: documentation
cfg-w4n3.description: Shared documentation — structure, sections, examples, generation config. Activate if you use generated docs.

fs-x7p6.name: tla_artifact_store
fs-x7p6.description: Filesystem working directory for generated TLA+ specs (.tla), TLC configs (.cfg), and model-checker output logs. Activate if using formal verification.

fs-y3q2.name: plan_artifact_store
fs-y3q2.description: Filesystem location for implementation plan files (.md) that serve as input to refinement and generation pipelines. Activate if using plan-driven generation.

notes: Template — copy to specs/schemas/resource_registry.json and customize
Conditional resources live in conditional_resources — move to resources when activated
Project-specific resources (CLI tools, project detectors, user config) are NOT included — add them as needed
UUIDs are fresh and do not overlap with any existing registry
